title.rendered: Godrej Tropical ISLE- An Ideal Housing Project to Buy Luxury Apartments

content.rendered:
Godrej Tropical ISLE- An Ideal Housing Project to Buy Luxury Apartments The real estate developers in Delhi/NCR are building massive residential projects in various places in Noida and Greater Noida in response to the strong demand of investors and homebuyers. In case, you are searching for luxury apartments in Noida, you should consider the residential project named Godrej Tropical Isle. This awesome housing project is based in sector-146, Noida that is an ideal place to live with family. This project offers furnished homes in the 3BHK and 4BHK levels.

Godrej Tropical ISLE
Godrej Tropical ISLE
The developer has made each apartment finished and equipped with all modern housing facilities such as toilets, bathrooms, kitchens, bedrooms, halls, balconies, doors, windows, etc. Godrej Tropical Isle Rera Also, the apartments are spacious for mid to large-size families. The whole project has been planned smartly by the developer and it occupies the space up to 12.5 acres of land along with 80% open space. Godrej 146 Noida Moreover, the buyers will also find all necessary amenities at the project site or a few minutes’ distance via road. So, you should not waste time and book luxury apartments in this brilliant housing project.

Godrej Tropical ISLE Location
Godrej Tropical Isle is located in the posh residential zone in Noida sector-146, which is a top-class residential locality that is blessed by nature around the corner. Godrej Tropical Isle RERA Number is UPRERAPRJ303390. Also, the project location is easy to commute via road to all major facilities like shopping malls, supermarkets, schools, colleges, institutions, offices, bus stands, metro stations, etc. Additionally, this project is based in the perfect place, which is well-connected to the highways like the DND flyover, Noida Expressway, and NH-24 via road. It is not all, the families will be happy to find a lush environment and pollution-free space at the project that will be safe for your family’s health. Thus, it will be convenient for families to live at the project site and find all necessary things close to the spot.

Godrej Tropical ISLE Apartments
Godrej developer is happy to launch this premium residential project for home seekers in Delhi/NCR. This Godrej Tropical Isle project includes strongly build apartments in 3BHK and 4BHK range. The apartments possess magnificent design and interior that fascinates the buyers a lot. Also, the project has good infrastructure and robust construction that make it an ideal structure for families. The apartments have made furnished with best-in-class living facilities such as bedrooms, kitchens, doors, windows, hall, toilets, etc. Moreover, the developer has provided all additional facilities to the apartments like air-conditioners, kitchen chimneys, furniture, cabinets, lighting, power backup, and more. The size range of apartments in this project is 1800 sq. ft. to 2500 sq. ft. Hence, it is an ideal investment housing scheme for buyers to book quality apartments in this project for the future.

Godrej Tropical ISLE Amenities
Godrej Tropical Isle is an outstanding housing project for investors who are seeking luxury property in Noida to book for a family. The developer has made this project more appealing to the buyers by providing good amenities such as a swimming pool, clubhouse, jogging track, tennis court, badminton court, CCTV, surveillance, kids’ playground, and more. Additionally, the project site has features such as a rain harvesting system, water treatment system, garbage collectors, drainage and sewage system, and more. With these amenities, it seems that this project has amazing features that make it an ideal project to buy property.

Godrej Tropical ISLE Price List
Godrej Tropical Isle is a perfect choice for investors to buy or rent luxury apartments in Noida. This brilliant project offers massive apartments at an affordable price range starting from 2.99 Cr. onwards. Hence, it is high time for buyers to book new property in Noida under this project.

For more details, you should visit the developer’s website www.drrealty.in
